name: Promote
description: PROMOTE is a utility token within the Night Crows game on the WEMIX3.0 blockchain. Backed by the in-game "Higher Seal of Advancement," it's essential for crafting the Scroll of Advancement, a crucial item in the game. Players can mint PROMOTE within the game's "TOKEN" menu after reaching level 45. With a fixed supply of 10 million tokens and a 1:1 value with its in-game counterpart, PROMOTE can also be traded on the PNIX DEX.
